data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Mayuge to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mayuge, Uganda

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Mayuge, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 11,600 souls in Mayuge and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Mayuge that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Hindi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Mayuge, Uganda to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 3,845 believers in Mayuge, Uganda a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Mayuge will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

location.name: Mayuge
location.people_groups_list: Kaliko, Plains Bira, Nyang'i, Mvuba, Kalenjin, Pokot
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kaliko (13,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Mvuba (1,200), Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000)
